ModMetaData.name: Beauty expansion! Prosthetics and Organs by Kkokoros!
ModMetaData.author: Kkokoros
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the ability to craft beauty prosthetics.
Adds 3 Tiers of artificial beauty prosthetics: T2: (110%)Bionic Replacements T3: (130%)Advanced Bionic Replacements T4: (140%)Ultra Bionic Replacements
Includes Replacements for: Eyes, Ears, Nose, Jaw, Spine, Ribcage, Sternum
Languages added: -English
Let me know what should I add next!
If you see any errors, issues or what I should rebalance. let me know in the comments.
